text.autoconfig.auto_login.title: Auto Login Command
text.autoconfig.auto_login.option.defaul: 在服务器项列表中新创建的服务器项将默认使用这里的设置。
储存着所有的指令和对应的延迟。

断线重连的延迟。单位：毫秒。默认：-1。
设为负数以关闭断线重连。
【注】如果数值太小（例如0），可能无法成功重连，请尽量设置得长一些（例如1000）。

断线重连的尝试周期，当第一次重连失败后，过此值对应的时间后会再次尝试连接，可以随时退出连接失败界面以停止尝试。单位：毫秒。默认：1000。
设为非正数以关闭断线重连的重复尝试。
text.autoconfig.auto_login.option.list.@: Stores set auto login command entry.
text.autoconfig.auto_login.option.Addres:
[Note] When you edit address in the multiplayer screen, this item won't follow the change, please edit this manually.
If you create new server entry in a server, the current server address will be automatically filled in
It stores all the commands and the corresponding delays.

Delay in reconnection after disconnection. In milliseconds. Default:-1. 
Set to negative to turn off disconnection. 
[Note] If the value is too small (e.g. 0) , you may not be able to successfully reconnect, please set it as large as possible (e.g. 1) .
text.autoconfig.auto_login.option.Comman:
The time interval from entering server to sending command. Unit: ms. Default: 3000.
[Note] In some servers, if you send command immediately after entering the sever, you will be kicked, so it needs to be delayed for a while.
The command sent to the server, which needs to start with'/'. If it doesn't start with'/', it will just send a normal chat message.
text.autoconfig.auto_login.option.Addres:
断线重连的尝试周期，当第一次重连失败后，过此值对应的时间后会再次尝试连接，可以随时退出连接失败界面以停止尝试。单位：毫秒。默认：1000。
设为非正数以关闭断线重连的重复尝试。
